ui_strings.description_text: At cafe Solace, we believe in more than just coffee—we craft moments of peace, comfort, and connection.

ice_cream.name: Ice cream
ice_cream.description: Perfect bowl for serving creamy, delicious ice cream treats quickly.

raspberry_tart.name: Raspberry tart
raspberry_tart.description: Buttery crust filled with sweet, tangy fresh raspberries and cream.

macarons.name: Macaron's
macarons.description: Delicate, colorful almond cookies with smooth, flavorful creamy fillings inside.

berry_whipped_cream_cake.name: Berry with whipped cream cake
berry_whipped_cream_cake.description: Light cake topped with fresh berries and fluffy whipped cream.

cup_cakes.name: Cup cakes
cup_cakes.description: Small, moist cakes topped with creamy frosting and sweet decorations.
